TextView.android:text: SEASIDE is a journal application that helps users to be able to express thoughts either privately or publicly.

We decided to name our application SEASIDE because studies show that it being beside one has great mental health effects. One is that it alters the brain waves alters also when a person hears the waves making it more relaxed. Relaxing is also one way to rejuvenate the mind and body and also lessen stress.

This is the aim of our application, to help lessen everyday stress through journaling. Keeping a journal is very beneficial and not a lot of people know this. A lot of articles have already tackled the benefits of keeping a journal. Examples are stretching your IQ, helping you heal in different aspects - emotionally, physically and psychologically, boosting your self confidence and improving your creativity.
